name: Nightmare Escape (Kid Stuff Games)
description:
Nightmares have a funny way of playing with our senses. Moving floors, running without getting anywhere, losing all your strength. Now imagine having to live like that. 

In Nightmare Escape, you help 4 kids escape from their recurring  nightmares.

6 different dark closets contain the six different nightmares you must guide your runners through, jumping,  dodging and sliding all of the way until they are able to wake up and leave the nightmares.

6 Nightmares in 4 levels.

4 different kids with different stats to choose from at the start of a nightmare.

Thousands of frames of animation.

No multiplayer, Seasons or DLC!!! Yes, that is a feature. Just like the good ol' days.

This is the first in a series of games from Kid Stuff Games that uses real people as the main player characters. It's what we do!
